content: wear your pride and solidarity with a rainbow pussy hat the pattern is quite easy and works up quickly and includes simple instructions for changing sizes you can make it with any worsted weight yarn the hat in the photos is made in rainbow pride colors - but you can make in any colors like the genderqueer flag colors in the last photo pride rainbow purple blue green yellow orange red asexual pride purple white gray black bisexual pride pink blue purple transgender pride blue pink white pink blue pansexual pride hot pink yellow blue nonbinary pride yellow white purple black genderqueer pride lavender white green
